name: Cosmic Powers of the Marvel Universe Quiz | Entertainment | 15 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of the only weapon in the universe that sends a shiver of fear down the spine of Galactus?
questions.explanation:
Ulitimate Nullifier.

	Reed Richards used the Ultimate Nullifier to stop Galactus from consuming the Earth. The Nullifier has the power to destroy anything the user directs its power toward, but the Nullifier also destroys the user in the process.

questions.text: What offshoot of humanity does Thanos belong?
questions.explanation:
Eternal.

	Thanos was one of the last sons of Alars, progenitor of the second colony of Eternals of Titan, a genetic offshoot of humanity, and Sui-San, the last survivor of the original settlement of Eternals.

questions.text: Which of the following is not an alternate identity of Kang the Conqueror?
questions.explanation:
Ulik.

	Kang created the identity of the Scarlet Centurion and decided to conquer 20th century Earth. Also using his advanced technology, Kang easily cowed the natives and became their ruler, the Pharaoh Rama Tut. He ruled Egypt for many years until the hero team Fantastic Four encountered him during their time travels. Immortus shares the early history of the time-traveling Kang, whose excursions into time eventually left him unfulfilled, and he decided to give up worldly conquests and meditate on the nature of time until the end of his days

questions.text: Where does Uatu the Watcher live?
questions.explanation:
Blue Area of Earth's Moon.

	Uatu belongs to a race of Watchers, born the son of the Watcher known as Ikor, who believed that superior races should help those less advanced. Uatu followed his father's advice, sharing technology with a "backward" planet, Prosicillus. Later, Prosicillus was destroyed due to nuclear war which led the Watchers to develp their "non-involvement" code of behavior and began their role in the universe as observers.

questions.text: Which cosmic villian is the first hybrid of a Deviant and an Inhuman?
questions.explanation:
Maelstrom.

	Maelstrom is the son of an Inhuman geneticist and a Deviant handmaiden, the first known hybrid of these two races of humanity's genetic offshoots.

questions.text: What is the name of the hammer Beta Ray Bill uses to fight off his demonic enemies?
questions.explanation:
Storm Breaker.

	Beta Ray Bill's hammer, Storm Breaker, is equal to Thor's hammer. It enables Beta Ray Bill to transform into his "Thor-form" and back, in addition to controlling weather, project lightning, traversing dimensional barriers, and to fly, by holding onto the hammer once thrown. The hammer is made of nearly indestructible Uru metal, and only a worthy being is able to wield it.

questions.text: Sticking to the subject of Beta Ray Bill, who caused the core of Bill's galaxy to explode?
questions.explanation:
Asgardian demon Surtur.

	Beta Ray Bill is a member of an extraterrestrial race of semi-humanoid beings which lived in a peaceful empire in a distant galaxy known as the "Burning Galaxy." In recent times, the Asgardian demon Surtur caused the core of the galaxy to explode, in order to release the energy he needed to reforge his "Sword of Doom."

questions.text: True or False: Rom the Spaceknight was from the Planet Galador?
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Prime Director of the planet Galador, learning of an attack by the alien the Dire Wraiths which destroyed an entire space fleet, asked the general populace of the planet for volunteers to sacrifice their human bodies and undergo surgical conversion into an army of cyborg warriors called Spaceknights, who would be adapted for the rigors of combat in outer space.

questions.text: Gabriel Lan was the real name of what former herald of Galactus?
questions.explanation:
Air Walker.

	Galactus announced that he was looking for a new herald to replace the defeated Silver Surfer, and having scanned Lan's mind, deemed him as an appropriate candidate. Hearing Galactus' offer of vast power and unlimited travel, Lan readily accepted and was transformed by a tiny fraction of Galactus' might into the Air-Walker, second of Galactus' heralds.

questions.text: Air Walker was killed and replaced by a robot, what other herald of Galactus was also a robot?
questions.explanation:
Destroyer.

	Thor was unaware of the Destroyer's true purpose, and in exchange for Firelord's freedom as Galactus' herald, he gave the armor to Galactus to use in his place.

questions.text: What is the name of the future, and evil version of Adam Warlock?
questions.explanation:
Magus.

	Adam took to the space-ways, and discovered the Magus, his evil future self, had enslaved a thousand worlds.

questions.text: Which Elder of the Universe made a pact with Death, making all the Elders unaffected by aging, disease, or toxins?
questions.explanation:
Grandmaster.

	Distraught over the death of his fellow Elder Collector, Grandmaster challenged death itself and won. The Elders of the Universe were granted immortality because of the Grandmasters victory.

questions.text: True or False: Exitar is the name of the Celestial's judge?
questions.explanation:
False.

	The name of the Celestial's judge is Arisham. Exitar is the Celestial who destroys the unlucky world that Arisham gives the thumbs down.

questions.text: What is the name of the substance that gave Jack of Hearts his powers?
questions.explanation:
Zero Fluid.

	Jack Hart was the son of Philip Hart, a scientist who developed a new type of efficient liquid fuel called "Zero Fluid". When Jack was a teenager, his father perfected the Zero Fluid, and was about to donate the fuel to all the free countries of the world, when agents of the criminal Corporation murdered Philip in front of Jack in order to keep the secret of Zero Fluid from becoming known. Trying to escape, Jack was doused with the Zero Fluid when the Corporation tried to destroy the laboratory.

questions.text: Who attached a giant propulsion unit on the surface of Ego the Living Planet and sent him hurtling through space?
questions.explanation:
Galactus.

	Ego went insane, and it took the combined powers of Thor, Hercules, Firelord, and Galactus to stop the mad planet. Galactus attached a propulsion unit that sent Ego soaring through space.
